types.type:
<prop type="string|function(http.IncomingMessage, _idio.MulterFile): !Promise" name="destination" opt> Used to determine within which folder the uploaded files should be stored. If given as a string, the location will be ensured prior at the start. Default is `tmpdir()`.
<prop type="function(http.IncomingMessage, _idio.MulterFile): !Promise" name="filename" opt> Used to determine what the file should be named inside the folder. If no filename is given, each file will be given a random name that doesn't include any file extension.
